# Please use one line per field and one file per project. Do not edit or remove any line starting with #

#organism
organism_species: Solanum lycopersicum
organism_variety: M82
organism_description: this organism is a plant, commonly known as tomato
# organism - end


#project
project_name: S. Lycopersicum M82 Fruit Development
project_contact: Jocelyn Rose
project_description: tomato expression data for fruit development.
index_dir_name: tomato_index
# project - end


# experiment --- All info needed for a cluster of images (usually includes a stage and all its tissues). Copy this block as many times as you need (including as many layer blocks as you need).

experiment_description:

img_ordinal: 10

img_ordinal: 100
